# Dominate Person or Ghost (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One humanoid

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 52

As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]**,* except that it also affects ghosts.
